```{r data_pull}

load(file = "../input/.RData")

p1 <- p1[order(-points),]

p1[,rank := 1:.N]

```

# Expected Points (Week) 

```{r}

g <- 
  p1[
    avg_type == "weighted"
    & position %in% c("QB","WR","TE","RB")
    ,
  ]

g$name <- paste0(g$first_name," ",g$last_name)

g$points <- round(g$points,0)

gg <-
ggplot(
  g
  ,aes(
    x = rank
    ,y = points
    ,group = position
    ,color = position
    ,label = name
  )
) + 
geom_pointrange(
  aes(
    ymin = floor
    ,ymax = ceiling
  )
) 

ggplotly(gg, tooltip = c("name","y","group"))

```
